column1: Since this Coronavirus is out and about and busy, I'm back to my vegan diet. Hell no.

Secondly, this Coronavirus is ailment that China (the epicenter) wants to experiment and research. Guess who are the guinea pigs now? HUMANS. Thirdly, Trump haven't said shit. Yet he's sending our troops closer to the epicenter. For them to bring that shit home! Open your eyes!
